    • Method Detail

      • isValidShoot

        public static boolean isValidShoot(Player player,
                                   GameManager gameManager)
        method used to calculate if the shooting action is valid or not. It generates all the possible path searching for all the possibilities(in terms of tile selection and weapon selection). If it finds a path in which the player can shoot, then it will return true
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        gameManager - the current game
        Returns:
        true if it's possible to shoot, false otherwise

      • isAValidShootingAction

        public static Tile isAValidShootingAction(Player player,
                                          GameManager gameManager,
                                          TileView t1)
                                   throws ShootingException
        method to check if it's a valid shooting action
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        gameManager - the current game
        t1 - the tileView selected to shoot
        Returns:
        true if it's a valid shooting action
        Throws:
        ShootingException - if the action is not valid. the error message depends on why the action is not possible

      • chooseTileShootingAction

        public static void chooseTileShootingAction(Player player,
                                            GameManager gameManager)

      • ShootingActionAfterTile

        public static void ShootingActionAfterTile(GameManager gameManager,
                                           Player player,
                                           Tile t1)
        method to do the shooting action after the player has chosen a valid tile where he wants to move before shooting it distinguish before different cases depending on if the game is in final frenzy or not (can reload before shoot)
        Parameters:
        gameManager - the current game
        player - the player's shooting
        t1 - the selected tile
